is to extend all the maladies that come with it.

name: Victario's Influence

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 45% increased Reservation Efficiency
(20-40)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

flavourText:
"Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

name: Esh's Visage

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield while not on Low Life
Reflect Shocks applied to you to all Nearby Enemies

name: Inpulsa's Broken Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Damage if you have Shocked an Enemy Recently

Shocked Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Life as Lightning Damage which cannot Shock

flavourText:
Don't hesitate; bring death to all, conclusively and swiftly,
or they will give you the same treatment.

name: Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

flavourText:
When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

name: Architect's Hand

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also Apply to Trap Throwing Speed
(4-6)% chance to throw up to 4 additional Traps

flavourText:
Great works take time.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Dominance}

name: Annihilation's Approach

explicitModifiers.text: Take 6000 Fire Damage per Second while Flame-Touched
Gain Adrenaline when you become Flame-Touched
Lose Adrenaline when you cease to be Flame-Touched

flavourText:
Pray that the flames find fascination,
for the true end follows when the great eye closes.

name: Replica Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 29 Added Cold Damage
Skills gain a Base Energy Shield Cost equal to 200% of Base Mana Cost

flavourText:
"Researcher Graven's request to wear Prototype #2998 in
place of his standard lab attire is... granted."
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

name: Doedre's Skin

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy

Grants Level 20 Summon Doedre's Effigy Skill
Socketed Hex Curse Skills are Triggered by Doedre's Effigy when Summoned
Hexes from Socketed Skills can apply 5 additional Curses

flavourText:
As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

name: Yriel's Fostering

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Ursa Skill
Projectile Attack Skills have (40-60)% increased Critical Strike Chance

Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to inflict Bleeding on Hit while
you have a Bestial Minion
Adds (11-16) to (21-25) Physical Damage to Attacks while you have a Bestial Minion

flavourText:
Feed a beast and it will not hunt.
Protect it and it will not fight.
Ferocity must be learned, not taught.
It is suffering that forges the greatest warriors.

name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: 35% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
100% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

name: The Tempest Rising

explicitModifiers.text: (5-25)% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
You and Enemies in your Presence count as moving while affected by Elemental Ailments

flavourText:
Where he tread, disintegrating storms of lightning
and death laid waste to all around him.

name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Gain up to maximum Endurance Charges when you take a Critical Strike
Your nearby party members maximum Endurance Charges is equal to yours

flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

name: Vis Mortis

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain (15-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

flavourText:
Reap what others have sown
Muster them from their graves
Parade them for your pleasure
Zealots in mortis enslaved

name: Doppelgänger Guise

explicitModifiers.text: (40-60)% more Critical Strike Chance while Insane
Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed while Insane
(30-40)% less Physical and Chaos Damage Taken while Sane
Regenerate 10% Life over one second when Hit while Sane

flavourText:
Within each of us exists a being of pure malice,
held back only by the lies we tell ourselves.

name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

flavourText:
The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. 
Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

name: Shavronne's Wrappings

explicitModifiers.text: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

flavourText:
Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

name: The Admiral

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Elemental Damage you Deal with Hits is Resisted by lowest Elemental Resistance instead

flavourText:
The Oriathans built their empire on naval mobility, which allowed
them to wage war wherever their enemy was weakest.

name: Perfidy

explicitModifiers.text: You can have two different Banners at the same time
Banners you are carrying gain 1 Stage on Melee Hit, up to 5 per second
War Banner has (101-200)% increased Adrenaline duration
Defiance Banner has (100-199)% increased Taunt duration
Dread Banner grants an additional +(2-4) to maximum Fortification when placing the Banner

flavourText:
The Trickster God turned the very Day and Night against each other.
What hope have you?

name: Icetomb

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you

flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

name: Aegis Aurora

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block
(10-20)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

flavourText:
Born from the marriage of ice and sky,
the aurora evokes both awe and power.

name: Gruthkul's Pelt
flavourText: Simple is the life of the bear.

name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

name: Shroud of the Lightless

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Trigger Level 20 Shade Form when you Use a Socketed Skill
3% increased Maximum Life per Abyss Jewel affecting you
3% increased Maximum Mana per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Penetrate 4% Elemental Resistances per Abyss Jewel affecting you

flavourText: Look to the darkness for nourishment and you will never go hungry.

name: The Devouring Diadem

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems have 25% increased Reservation Efficiency
Trigger Level 15 Feast of Flesh every 5 seconds
Trigger Socketed Spells when you Focus, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
(10-12)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention
10% chance for Energy Shield Recharge to start when you use a Skill
(36-40)% increased Duration of Ailments you inflict while Focused
Focus has (5-8)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate

flavourText: The spirit hungers for the flesh.

name: The Stampede

explicitModifiers.text: (50-80)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills
(30-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while moving
Your Movement Speed is 150% of its base value

flavourText:
Relentlessness. Nothing more, nothing less.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

name: The Ivory Tower

explicitModifiers.text: +30 to maximum Energy Shield per 100 Reserved Life
Regenerate 2% of Energy Shield per second
Chaos Damage is taken from Mana before Life

flavourText: The mind is a filter through which anarchy becomes order.

name: Replica Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

flavourText:
"Better... stronger... more vital... and then... failure. Always, failure.
What key fundamental secret are we missing?"

name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

name: Replica Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: You can Cast an additional Brand
20% increased Critical Strike Chance per Brand

flavourText:
"As one of our few creations that did not cost any fatalities,
Prototype #10 bore unexpectedly positive results."

name: Cospri's Will

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse
Your Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
Always Poison on Hit against Cursed Enemies

flavourText:
Curse their vile Council,
They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.
If they only knew the power I possess.

name: Daresso's Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit
100% increased Effect of Onslaught on you

flavourText:
"When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King

name: Geofri's Sanctuary
flavourText:
Faith does not make us invulnerable.
It makes us immortal.

name: Farrul's Fur

explicitModifiers.text: Aspect of the Cat has no Reservation
Gain up to your maximum number of Frenzy and Power Charges when you gain Cat's Stealth
You have Phasing while you have Cat's Stealth

flavourText:
The First of the Plains was the First of the Hunt
It was she who showed us that there is honour
in waiting in the shadows and picking your moment.

name: Replica Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 29 Added Cold Damage
Skills gain a Base Energy Shield Cost equal to 200% of Base Mana Cost

flavourText:
"Researcher Graven's request to wear Prototype #2998 in
place of his standard lab attire is... granted."
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

name: Belly of the Beast
flavourText:
There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast

name: Bronn's Lithe

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Movement Gems

flavourText:
Forget your kite shield. Just put the biggest man
 in the field between you and the archers.

name: Hyrri's Ire

explicitModifiers.text: (105-145) to (160-200) Added Cold Damage with Bow Attacks

flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
50% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

name: Queen of the Forest

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals

flavourText:
Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

name: Redblade Banner
flavourText: Blood shed is blood shared.

name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

name: The Formless Inferno

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Infernal Legion
Minion Life is increased by their Overcapped Fire Resistance

flavourText: He burns us to keep us from harm.

name: Tinkerskin

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for throwing Traps
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
30% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 100 Life when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 50 Energy Shield when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy

flavourText: Thin is the line between mechanical genius and magic.

name: Wraithlord

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of all Minion Skill Gems
+1 to maximum number of Spectres per Socketed Ghastly Eye Jewel

flavourText:
Countless men proclaimed themselves the masters of death,
and each one succumbed to it.

name: Magna Eclipsis

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Elemental Aegis when Equipped
+(80-100) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

flavourText:
Lunaris crossed silently, shining and full, 
Softly night left her, alone and forlorn.
Solaris rose to meet her, feeling her pull.
'Neath the midday sun, the night was reborn.

name: The Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Glimpse of Eternity when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Shaper Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Shaper Items

flavourText: There can be no defence against the celestial siblings entropy and time.

name: Replica Maloney's Mechanism

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Cast a Spell while
wielding a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks

flavourText:
"The Midnight Tinkerer's aid was invaluable during our brief alliance,
but when we failed to make any progress on resurrection, he continued his search elsewhere..."

name: Expedition's End

explicitModifiers.text: Freeze Chilled Enemies as though dealing (50-100)% more Damage

flavourText:
He may have returned from the frozen southern reaches,
but that doesn't mean he ever truly escaped them.

name: Briskwrap
flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

name: The Formless Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Armour is increased by Overcapped Fire Resistance

name: The Red Trail

explicitModifiers.text: 10% additional Physical Damage Reduction while stationary
Gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Bleeding
50% chance to be inflicted with Bleeding when Hit by an Attack

flavourText:
We leave a trail, that we may know
where never we will return.

name: Craiceann's Carapace

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

name: The Perfect Form

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Overcapped Cold Resistance

flavourText:
We share one space,
speak one voice,
act through one body.
A flawless crystal.
Brittle.

name: Replica Kaom's Heart
flavourText:
"Useless for our purposes, but perhaps we can sell Prototype #5
to an archmage to fund other experiments."

name: Greed's Embrace
flavourText:
Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

flavourText: The Azmeri must never touch the Tears of Maji, lest Viridi weep.

name: Carcass Jack
flavourText:
"...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

name: Lioneye's Vision

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pierce
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

flavourText:
"The Virtue Gems are a gift from the land, 
our land, and we will not let our gifts
be destroyed by savages."
- Marceus Lioneye

name: The Beast Fur Shawl
flavourText:
The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Skin of the Loyal

name: Ahn's Heritage

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
+2% to all maximum Resistances while you have no Endurance Charges
You have Onslaught while at maximum Endurance Charges

flavourText:
"It's not Karui, Azmeri or even Vaal in origin,
but one thing is certain. It is very, very old."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 46

name: Inya's Epiphany

explicitModifiers.text:
25% chance that if you would gain Power Charges, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Power Charges

flavourText:
Though the path we walk is the same,
each journey is different.

name: Speaker's Wreath

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Minion Attack Speed per 50 Dexterity
2% increased Minion Movement Speed per 50 Dexterity
Minions' Hits can only Kill Ignited Enemies

flavourText:
A strong pair of legs may carry you far,
but a silver tongue and a few brutes
can take you to the edge of the world.

name: Eber's Unification

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Void Gaze when you use a Skill
Gain (5-8)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

flavourText:
The impediments of flesh are weak.
The air we breathe knows no such boundaries.
I exhale, and you inhale,
and inexorably we inch towards oneness.

name: The Embalmer

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Vile Toxins

flavourText:
"Decomposition takes hold too quickly!
No, if we are to keep the specimen in perfect shape,
we must begin the process before expiry."

name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Chance to Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

flavourText:
Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

name: Giantsbane

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-8) to (12-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

flavourText:
The monstrous men of yore used bows too,
theirs were just bigger.

name: Kalisa's Grace

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Casting
Gain +2% to Critical Strike Chance for 2 seconds after Spending a total of 800 Mana

flavourText:
"You shall hang, in blissful agony, on my every note."
- Kalisa, Prima Donna of Sarn

name: Oskarm

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Assassin's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy and have no Mark
2% increased Attack Critical Strike Chance per 200 Accuracy Rating

flavourText:
Land and sea did not dissuade,
nor did the Kelpie's maw;
the wild beast crossed half the world
to sate his hungry claw.

name: Bloodbond

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +(12-15)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

name: Stormcharger
flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

name: Ahn's Contempt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (8-12)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage while at maximum Power Charges
You take 50% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes while you have no Power Charges

flavourText:
"To touch it is to be overwhelmed with the need to carve your name into history.
A face no one remembers, yet once you have seen it, you will never forget."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 48

name: Leper's Alms

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies

flavourText: One's burden is another's gift.

name: Lightpoacher

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Spirit Burst when you Use a Skill while you have a Spirit Charge
+1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
Gain 5% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element per Spirit Charge

flavourText:
The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

name: Mark of the Red Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Raging Spirits deal (175-250)% increased Damage
75% reduced Maximum number of Summoned Raging Spirits
Summoned Raging Spirits' Hits always Ignite

Summoned Raging Spirits' Melee Strikes deal Fire-only Splash
Damage to Surrounding Targets

flavourText:
Gleeful are the few
who bask in the blood of the many.

name: Gorgon's Gaze

explicitModifiers.text: 5% additional Physical Damage Reduction while moving
5% reduced Elemental Damage taken while stationary

flavourText:
Men always fell for her honeyed eyes,
and broke when they hit the ground.

name: Zeel's Amplifier

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently

flavourText:
"Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis, 
is the only secret worth discovering." 
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

name: The Eternal Apple

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill on losing Endurance Charges, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
You lose all Endurance Charges on reaching maximum Endurance Charges

flavourText:
The empire is both the tree and the fruit.
It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within,
and when the time is right, the apple is picked. 
The idea, and our ideals, take root.

name: Curtain Call

explicitModifiers.text: Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Dexterity
Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Intelligence

flavourText:
Sing with me one last duet,
the curtain closes nigh.
Join me in a quiet song,
Before we all must die.

name: Demon Stitcher

explicitModifiers.text: Sacrifice (5-25)% of Life to gain that much Energy Shield when you Cast a Spell

flavourText:
Xibaqua's treachery was met with divine fury.
One by one, the gods reclaimed their flesh,
until all that remained was a droplet of pure light:
The first Vaal.

name: Wreath of Phrecia

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Area of Effect at 50% of their value
Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Damage

flavourText: The Light drove the darkness from our lands and from our hearts.

name: Aukuna's Will

explicitModifiers.text: Raised Zombies have (80-100)% increased maximum Life
Raise Zombie does not require a corpse
Your Raised Zombies count as corpses

flavourText: The Black Sekhema's trial had only just begun.

name: Torchoak Step

explicitModifiers.text: Totems Reflect 100% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage to nearby Enemies when Hit

flavourText:
Centuries ago, there existed a unique grove imbued with ancestral fire.
As with all things, the Karui used its wood for war.

name: Triad Grip

explicitModifiers.text: Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Fire Damage per Red Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage per Green Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Chaos Damage per White Socket
Minions have (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

flavourText: The secret of the elements lies within a square triangle.

name: Painseeker

explicitModifiers.text: Critical Strikes do not inherently inflict non-Damaging Ailments
Inflict non-Damaging Ailments as though dealing (100-200)% more Damage

flavourText: Lay bare paths to pain you never knew you had.

name: Eye of Malice

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to inflict Cold Exposure on Hit
25% chance to inflict Fire Exposure on Hit
Nearby Enemies have 50% increased Fire and Cold Resistances

flavourText:
Through vision coloured by burning rage and icy hate
peers a visitor from a realm of ill intent...

name: Algor Mortis

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% chance to Sap Enemies in Chilling Areas
Enemies in your Chilling Areas take (25-35)% increased Lightning Damage

flavourText: Winter's white blanket swaddles all.

name: Great Old One's Tentacles

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
50% chance for Impales on Enemies you Kill to Reflect Damage to surrounding Enemies

flavourText:
Under its influence, shards of metal take on a life of their own, wriggling into flesh,
burrowing into organs, and exploding outwards in search of other victims.

name: Willclash

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Spell Damage per Power Charge
(3-5)% increased Elemental Damage per Power charge
Gain a Power Charge every Second if you haven't lost Power Charges Recently
Lose all Power Charges when you Block

flavourText: Obtaining information depends upon pretending one already has it.

name: Mercenary's Lot

explicitModifiers.text: Mark Skills have (10-15)% increased Cast Speed
(30-50)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Marked Enemy
Your Mark Transfers to another Enemy when Marked Enemy dies

flavourText: The target changes, but the job's always the same.

name: The Ghastly Theatre

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
Triggers Level 20 Physical Aegis when Equipped
(8-15)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while Physical Aegis is depleted
(50-70)% increased Critical Strike Chance while Physical Aegis is depleted
Nearby Enemies are Blinded while Physical Aegis is not depleted

flavourText:
Never let the audience know your true form. Misdirect them,
beguile them. Strike when they least expect it.

name: Hrimnor's Resolve

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Avoid being Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently

flavourText:
Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

name: Steelworm

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks that Fire Projectiles Consume up to 1 additional Steel Shard

Skills Fire 3 additional Projectiles for 4 seconds after
you consume a total of 12 Steel Shards

flavourText: The dance of metal and flesh never ends.

name: The Oppressor

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to amount of Suppressed Spell Damage Prevented
You take 20% of Damage from Blocked Hits

flavourText: Every clash leaves one more scar.

name: Blackgleam

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Fire Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks

flavourText:
Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

name: Saemus' Gift
flavourText:
Beaten in contest, he would try once more
Guided by magic, Magjar took aim at a dove
Saemus' gift would influence the score
Guided by darkness, Magjar spilled the blood of his love

name: Asphyxia's Wrath

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies within 3 metres when Hexed Enemy dies

flavourText:
Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

name: Rearguard

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-9) to (13-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

flavourText:
"It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

name: Scorpion's Call

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (150-200) Life per Second while in Blood Stance
(40-60)% increased Projectile Damage while in Blood Stance
+(700-1000) to Evasion Rating while in Sand Stance
(20-30)% increased Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
(25-30)% increased Attack Speed if you've changed Stance Recently

flavourText: Claws open, brace for a bite. Stinger raised, dodge or die.

name: Maloney's Nightfall

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

explicitModifiers.text: (8-10) to (14-16) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
25% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

flavourText:
Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

name: Ghostwrithe

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

flavourText: Faith springs abundant at the edge of death.

name: Elevore

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (100-200) Life when you Suppress Spell Damage

flavourText:
Ancient worshippers of the Greatwolf were overtaken
by a ravenous hunger for all things mystical.

name: Briskwrap
flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

name: Kongming's Stratagem

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Fog of War when your Trap is triggered
(30-50)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
30% reduced Spell Damage taken from Blinded Enemies

flavourText:
Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered.
Those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. 
Thus the wise win before they fight, 
while the ignorant fight to win.

name: Allelopathy
flavourText:
"Nothing is more natural than competition.
One feasts, another starves.
One blossoms, another withers.
And one cannot catch the golden sunlight
without casting a bitter shadow."
- Cadiro Perandus

name: Orbala's Stand

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Stunned by Suppressed Spell Damage
Debilitate Enemies for 4 Seconds when you Suppress their Spell Damage

flavourText:
The inferno surged past, devastating Stridevolf, but the Maraketh
warrior somehow remained. Soot-blackened and resolute, she
grinned. In that moment, the bandit king knew true despair.

name: Tanu Ahi

explicitModifiers.text: (2-3)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

10% chance to gain Adrenaline for 2 Seconds when Leech is
removed by Filling Unreserved Life

10% chance to gain Onslaught for 4 Seconds when Leech is
removed by Filling Unreserved Life

flavourText:
There is no greater thrill than leaping into combat,
slashing and hewing with utmost abandon.

name: Stormseeker

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Effect of Chills you inflict while Leeching Mana
(60-100)% increased Effect of Shocks you inflict while Leeching Energy Shield
Unaffected by Chill while Leeching Mana
Unaffected by Shock while Leeching Energy Shield

flavourText:
The fundamental forces of our world are secrets
to be uncovered by the intelligent and the capable.
Like all secrets, they, too, can be stolen.

name: Blood Price

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemy Monsters have at least 8% of Life Reserved

flavourText: An eye for an eye makes the whole world dead.

name: Kahuturoa's Certainty
flavourText: Confidence is calm and measured.

name: Kiloava's Bluster

explicitModifiers.text: (30-40)% chance for Elemental Resistances to count as being 90% against Enemy Hits

flavourText: Not even the storm knows when lightning will strike.

name: Ahuana's Bite

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (6-8) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (30-40) to (60-70) Cold Damage to Attacks
Enemies Chilled by your Hits have Damage taken increased by Chill Effect
Chill Enemies as though dealing (60-100)% more Damage

flavourText: The last Queen of the Karui gave up power willingly.

name: The Trickster's Smile

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 100 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers
Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
Reflects 100 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
When an Enemy Hit deals Elemental Damage to you, their Resistance to those Elements becomes zero for 4 seconds

flavourText:
The Raven Trickster made no move to defend himself.
He merely grinned... and the foolish warrior charged.

name: The Flawed Refuge

explicitModifiers.text: You take 100% of Elemental Damage from Blocked Hits
40% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

flavourText:
The Wildwood was a gift, meant as a haven
against the Winter of the World.

name: Veruso's Ambition

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

flavourText:
"Follow me if you desire better for yourself, and for your
families. Follow me if you hunger for more than this!"
